title: T206 Bob Unglaub - PSA 2 Peidmont 350 Fac. 25
author: VintageJay

posts.post_title: T206 Bob Unglaub - PSA 2 Peidmont 350 Fac. 25
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Bob Unglaub Piedmont 350 Fac. 25 available for sale or trade.

As you can see, it's a PSA 2 (nice eye appeal for a 2!).

Asking $25 delivered (Paypal F&F only please).

I'm also willing to trade for any T206 Boston Americans (Red Sox). Trade doesn't have to involve graded cards. Actually, I would rather raw.
